brandNameResponsiveness.message: Brand name has both desktop (single line) and mobile (stacked) implementations

headerHeights.message: Header heights correctly set (h-14 for mobile, md:h-16 for desktop)

navigationStructure.message: Navigation structure complete with desktop nav, mobile button, and mobile menu

hoverStates.message: Hover states implemented with smooth transitions

fixedPositioning.message: Header properly positioned with backdrop blur

contentPadding.message: Main content has correct padding (pt-16 md:pt-20)

layoutStructure.message: Layout structure complete with Navigation, Main, and Footer

heroSpacing.message: Hero section accounts for header height in viewport calculations

recommendations: Test header on physical devices to verify touch interactions
Verify header performance with slow network connections
Test with various content lengths in navigation items
Verify accessibility with screen readers and keyboard navigation
